href.description: RFC5988 style web-links serialized into JSON. This is the target URI

rel.description: The relation of the target URI referenced by the link to the context URI

rt.description: Resource Type - A standard OIC specified or vendor defined resource type of the resource referenced by the target URI

if.description: Interface - The interfaces supported by the resource referenced by the target URI

obs.description: Specifies if the resource referenced by the target URIis observable or not

title.description: A title for the link relation. Can be used by the UI to provide a context

anchor.description: This is used to override the context URI e.g. override the URI of the containing collection

oneOf.description: An ordinal number that is not repeated - must be unique in the collection context
Any unique string including a URI
Use UUID for universal uniqueness - used in /oic/res to identify the device

ins.description: The instance identifier for this web link in an array of web links - used in collections

ttl.description: The time to live for this link in seconds - value is specified in a request only and is not returned on response. Max integer size to represent time is 4 octets

type.description: A hint at the representation of the resource referenced by the target URI
